comment: The most intense aerial combat experience I've ever had. The escape missions are absolutely thrilling and the controls are incredibly responsive. This is what jet combat should feel like!
Incredible graphics and smooth controls. The jet physics feel incredibly realistic and the upgrade system adds so much depth to the gameplay. Every mission feels unique!
The upgrade system adds so much depth. Every mission feels unique and challenging. The AI opponents are smart and the weather system really adds to the immersion.
Finally, a flight game that gets the controls right! The afterburner mechanics and weapon systems feel authentic. The escape missions are perfectly balanced.
